name: Trijam 148 - Firefly
description:
FireFly

Love is in the air, but life as a firefly ain't easy! It is this time of year when the fireflies are going to find their love mates; In a cozy cave, you make it your mission to find as many love mates as you possibly can; but enemy fireflies are also on the hunt! Thank god you got an incredible superpower: The SUPER POTENT GLOW - which makes you extremely attractive for the female fireflies; but the GLOW also allows enemy fireflies to destroy you!

Instructions and tipps

WASD to move, SPACE to activate glow; glow is active for 2 seconds and allows you to collide with blue female fireflies and gain lovepoints; it also makes you vulnerable for red enemy fireflies to kill you; choose wisely when to activate the GLOW; 

tip: While no GLOW is active, you are invincible and can move around blue and red fireflies - that may help you to move to a better position; don't take too long as there will be more and more enemies who will continue to eat up your blue female fireflies!

Time spent (3 hrs total):

  • Coding: 2 hrs
  • Art 40 min
  • Music 20 min

Credits Font: Avocado by The Docallisme - Amry Al Mursalaat
